attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the unruly state of the nation with the volume of crime sometimes fueled by drugs and alcohol and the lack of respect for the elderly a period of say two years national service would instil respect and discipline into the young person's life. Not only would this help the nation but it would strengthen the forces. Also perhaps with these extra resources the army could take a role alongside the police to bring back a zero tolerance of crime in our communities

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
